entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:22 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming sunny in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:22 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:22 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
